import { Badge, Box, Chip, Grid, Typography } from '@mui/material' import React from 'react' import { ADD_ITEMS } from '../../../utils/constants' import styles from "./style.module.scss" import { HeartBroken } from '@mui/icons-material' const AddToCart = () => { const itemsList = [ { name: 'Burger', price: 130, favorite: true, amount: 1 }, { name: 'Pizza', price: 850, favorite: true, amount: 1 }, { name: 'Apple', price: 50, favorite: false, amount: 1 }, { name: 'Book', price: 460, favorite: false, amount: 1 }, { name: 'Shoes', price: 2600, favorite: true, amount: 2 }, { name: 'Comb', price: 50, favorite: false, amount: 1 }, { name: 'Hair Dryer', price: 1550, favorite: false, amount: 1 }, { name: 'Laptop', price: 55000, favorite: true, amount: 1 }, { name: 'Cocomo', price: 25, favorite: false, amount: 5 }, ] return ( <>
{ADD_ITEMS}
{ itemsList.map(item => ( <> {item.name}
)) } ) } export default AddToCart
